hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:He who performed ablution well, then came to Friday prayer, listened (to the sermon), kept silence all (his sins) between that time and the next Friday would be forgiven with three days extra, and he who touched pebbles caused an interruption

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَنِ اسْتَمَعَ وَأَنْصَتَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of one who remains silent and listens attentively during the khutbah
